Short Description: An AI-powered conversational assistant for recruitment that automates screening, scheduling, and engagement.
Detailed Overview (HTML):
Paradox.ai uses its AI assistant Olivia to revolutionize recruiting by handling repetitive and time-sensitive tasks like candidate screening, interview scheduling, and onboarding. It enables recruiters to focus on building relationships while the AI handles logistics. Use Cases: frontline and hourly hiring at scale (retail, healthcare, logistics), event-based recruiting (job fairs), and DEI-focused campaigns. Paradox integrates deeply with ATS systems and offers real-time analytics to optimize hiring funnels.

Ideal for organizations hiring thousands of employees per year across multiple regions or locations.
Features (HTML):
AI-Powered Analysis
Uses conversational AI to handle screening and candidate responses 24/7.
Workflow Automation
Automates scheduling, reminders, and follow-ups.
Smart Integrations
Works with Greenhouse, Workday, ADP, SuccessFactors, and more.
Advanced Reporting
Real-time funnel tracking, DEI metrics, and event ROI analysis.
Collaboration Tools
Coordinate between recruiters, hiring managers, and candidates.
Custom Configurations
Set role-specific flows, local languages, and interview formats.
